io.github.goodees.ese.core.async

Class AsyncResult<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>
      • io.github.goodees.ese.core.async.AsyncResult<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of result
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompletionStage<T>, Future<T>

    public class AsyncResult<T>
extends CompletableFuture<T>
    Helper class for constructing asynchronous responses. It offers convenience methods for the constructs, that are common in AsyncEntity.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AsyncResult.SideEffect<T,U>
      A side effect that may throw an exception
      static interface  AsyncResult.VoidSideEffect
      A side effect that returns void
      static class  AsyncResult.WithRecovery<U>
      Stage allowing for composition when parent stage fails.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture

        CompletableFuture.AsynchronousCompletionTask

      • thenTry

        public AsyncResult.WithRecovery<T> thenTry(AsyncResult.VoidSideEffect sideEffect)
        Execute a side effect, and allow for compensation logic should it throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        sideEffect - side effect to perform
        Returns:
        WithRecovery stage, that will repeat the result of this stage if side effect doesn't fail
        See Also:
        AsyncResult.WithRecovery.onFailure(Function)

      • onFailure

        public AsyncResult<T> onFailure(java.util.function.Function<Throwable,AsyncResult<T>> compensationLogic)
        A variant of CompletionStage.thenCompose(Function) that is executed when this results completes exceptionally.
        Parameters:
        compensationLogic - the compensation logic to execute. If the throwable is an CompletionException, it will be unwrapped
        Returns:
        a stage that will compose given logic when this stage completes exceptionally.

      • invoke

        public static <V> AsyncResult<V> invoke(Callable<V> action)
        Wrap a result of callable. The callable is invoked immediately.
        Type Parameters:
        V - type of result
        Parameters:
        action - The action to perform
        Returns:
        Async result wrapping the return value or exception thrown from a callable

      • returning

        public static <V> AsyncResult<V> returning(V result)
        Wrap a value.
        Type Parameters:
        V - type of result
        Parameters:
        result - value to wrap
        Returns:
        an AsyncResult that completed successfully with the result.

      • throwing

        public static <V> AsyncResult<V> throwing(Throwable t)
        Wrap an exception
        Type Parameters:
        V - The original return type of the throwable.
        Parameters:
        t - Throwable to wrap.
        Returns:
        an AsyncResult that completed exceptionally with given throwable.

      • bindTo

        public static <V> AsyncResult<V> bindTo(java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.function.BiConsumer<V,Throwable>> callbackConsumer)
        Create an AsyncResult bound to other object. For example to bind to a CompletionStage you may use: asyncResult = AsyncResult.bindTo(completionStage::whenComplete);
        Type Parameters:
        V - type of result
        Parameters:
        callbackConsumer - the method accepting a callback for result and throwable
        Returns:
        new AsyncResult that completes when its callback is called
